ComicInfo.Summary: A powerful demon offers Sara an ideal life in which her father is alive and she is a school teacher if she will only surrender the Witchblade. Ian is also offered a deal if he will relinquish Excalibur. Ian resists but, in order to drive off the demon, he has to let Sara know that he is the one responsible for killing her father.
